languages.text: Ксенос ритмично издает один и тот же звук, словно пытается что-то произнести, но каждый раз сбивается и начинает заново.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.
languages.original_text: Ксенос ритмично издает один и тот же звук, словно пытается что-то произнести, но каждый раз сбивается и начинает заново.

traits.locale_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over — as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thoughts and starting anew every time.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over — as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thoughts and starting anew every time.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.
The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

languages.text: Le xénos répète encore et encore le même son rythmé, comme s'il essayait de dire quelque chose, mais perdait le fil de ses pensées et recommençait à chaque fois.
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

traits.locale_text: Le xénos répète encore et encore le même son rythmé, comme s'il essayait de dire quelque chose, mais perdait le fil de ses pensées et recommençait à chaque fois.

languages.text: El xenos está haciendo el mismo sonido rítmico constantemente, como si tratara de decir algo, pero perdiera el hilo y volviera a empezar una y otra vez.
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

traits.locale_text: El xenos está haciendo el mismo sonido rítmico constantemente, como si tratara de decir algo, pero perdiera el hilo y volviera a empezar una y otra vez.

languages.text: 这个异形一遍又一遍地发出同样节奏的声音，似乎想说些什么，但每次说到一半都中断下来，重新开始。
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

traits.locale_text: 这个异形一遍又一遍地发出同样节奏的声音，似乎想说些什么，但每次说到一半都中断下来，重新开始。

languages.text: その異種族はひとつのリズミカルな音を何度も何度もくり返している。まるで何かを言おうとしているかのようだが、その度に思考を失い、また新しくやりなおしているのだ。
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

traits.locale_text: その異種族はひとつのリズミカルな音を何度も何度もくり返している。まるで何かを言おうとしているかのようだが、その度に思考を失い、また新しくやりなおしているのだ。

languages.text: Der Xenos macht immer wieder dasselbe rhythmische Geräusch, als würde er versuchen, etwas zu sagen, aber immer wieder den gedanklichen Faden verlieren und von vorne beginnen.
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.

traits.locale_text: Der Xenos macht immer wieder dasselbe rhythmische Geräusch, als würde er versuchen, etwas zu sagen, aber immer wieder den gedanklichen Faden verlieren und von vorne beginnen.

languages.text: Zeno, sanki bir şey söylemeye çalışıyormuş ama söyleyeceğini unutup baştan başlıyormuşçasına aynı ritmik sesi tekrar tekrar çıkarıyor.
languages.original_text: The xenos is making the same rhythmic sound over and over, as if trying to say something, but losing its train of thought and starting anew every time.
